verses.name: Acts 5:22
verses.text: But when the officers came, and found them not in the prison, they returned, and told,

verses.name: Acts 5:23
verses.text: Saying, The prison truly found we shut with all safety, and the keepers standing without before the doors: but when we had opened, we found no man within.

verses.name: Acts 5:24
verses.text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things, they doubted of them whereunto this would grow.

verses.name: Acts 5:25
verses.text: Then came one and told them, saying, Behold, the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple, and teaching the people.
